<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elven Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=24) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 41 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Elven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in [longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [composite longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74), [longswords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [rapiers](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), [composite shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75), and all elf weapons in which you are trained.
name: Elven Weapon Expertise
